short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to remove Countdowns and annoying SocialLockers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension remove the annoying SocialLockers and Countdowns.

NEWS
===
1.1.0
- Added 6 new Countdowns and Lockers :)

1.0.4
- Added support for news PopUps and Lockers

1.0.2
- Added support for "UI facebook Locker"

1.0.1
- Added system to monitor changes on DOM
